original_text:
Mightier than the thunders of many waters,
    mightier than the waves of the sea,
    the Lord on high is mighty!
korean_text: 높이 계신 여호와의 능력은 많은 물 소리와 바다의 큰 파도보다 크니이다

sentences.original_text: Mightier than the thunders of many waters
mightier than the waves of the sea
the Lord on high is mighty!
